channel.title: Stuck in 1680x1050
channel.description: My laptop has a resolution of 1920 x 1080, and I've been playing quite happily at that resolution for a while now. However, shenanigans forced me to play on an external monitor with a resolution of 1680 x 1050 for a few days, and I have returned to my original screen to find that the game is still at 1680 x 1050 without presenting a 1920 x 1080 option. The external monitor currently is not even connected, and every other graphics-related setting on the computer reports the resolution as 1920 x 1080.

item.title: Stuck in 1680x1050
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
Does BM still separate resolutions between aspect ratios?

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck in 1680x1050
item.dc:creator: Snaiper
item.description:
Johnwalter:

Question is, why it didn’t change your resolution in-game like it’s suppose to…

At this point I believe very stupid bugs are intrinsic to the Source Engine

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck in 1680x1050
item.dc:creator: Admiral_Sakai
item.description:
Actually, I got the same result by manually altering the values in videoconfig.cfg. Thanks for pointing me in the right direction, regardless.

Read full topic

item.title: Stuck in 1680x1050
item.dc:creator: Snaiper
item.description:
Try these Steam launch options: [tt]-width 1920 -height 1080[/tt]

Read full topic
